ARABIC: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَهْلَكْنَٰهُمْ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةً وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So they denied him and We destroyed them. There is certainly a Sign in that, yet most of them are not
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then they accused him of lies; so We annihilated them. Verily there is a sign in this, but most of them do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Eventually they gave the lie to him and We destroyed them. Surely there is a Sign in this, but most of them would not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In this there is evidence (of the Truth), yet most of them do not have any faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In response they denied him – We therefore destroyed them; indeed in this is a sign; and most of them were not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So they denied him, and We destroyed them. Verily, in this is indeed a sign, yet most of them are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So they gave him the lie, then We destroyed them. Most surely there is a sign in this, but most of them do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So they cried him lies; then We destroyed them. Surely in that is a sign, yet most of them are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they denied him; therefor We destroyed them. Lo! herein is indeed a portent, yet most of them are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So they rejected him; and We destroyed them. There is certainly a sign in that; but most of them would not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they belied him; so We destroyed them. Verily herein is a sign, yet most of them are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So they impugned him, whereupon We destroyed them. There is indeed a sign in that; but most of them do not have faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So they rejected him, and We destroyed them. Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So they belied him, and We destroyed them. Verily! In this is indeed a sign, yet most of them are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So they belied him, so We destroyed them. Surely, in that there is a sign; yet most of them do not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So they denied him, and We destroyed them. Surely in this is a sign, but most of them are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they denied him, so We destroyed them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:139] So they denied him, concerning the chastisement, whereupon We destroyed them, in this world with the [barren] wind [cf. Q. 51:41]. Surely in that there is a sign; but most of them are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 417 (And they denied him) they disbelieved in his message and in what he said to them; (therefore We destroyed them) by the wind. (Lo! Herein) in that which We did to them (is indeed a portent) a sign and an admonition to those who came after them, (yet most of them are not believers) they were not believers and most of them were disbelievers.
